About 15_maven

The project 15_maven is a multi-module project and related to learning maven

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
11_io The module 11_io is related to input/output task
13_junit The module 13_junit is related to learning junit tests
13_junit_mock The module 13_junit_module is related to learning junit tests with mocks
